hanzi-su-wiki:
関

Значения

Иметь отношение, затрагивать, ставить под угрозу; застава; касаться

Мнемоника

  • Обход постов с факелами, видимых через створки ворот 門. По иной версии — ворота на двойном запоре 关, т.е. барьер, застава.

  • "Я принёс подарок к воротам 門, чтобы иметь хорошие отношения."

Варианты

關, 关
purpleculture_pinyin:
guān
variant of 关
вариант выключения
rtega_mnemonic:
関関RSfrontier pass, close, relation, connection, barrier
  • image of a person 关 passing through a gate 門; barrier 关 closing off a gate 門; barrier 关 connecting both sides of a gate 門
heisig_constituent: connection, gates, golden calf, horns, heavens
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: соединение, шлагбаум, ворота, включают, в отношении
koohiiStory1: At the airport, the woolly mammoth was too big. When he tried to go through his flight's gate he got stuck and missed his connecting flight.
koohiiStory2: The wooly mammoth Smashes the gates down restoring the connection between the glacier and the low lands.
kunYomi: せき、-ぜき、かか.わる、からくり、かんぬき
jp_example_words:
関与(かんよ): participation, taking part in, participating in, being concerned in
関税(かんぜい): customs, duty, tariff
関西(かんさい): Kansai (SW half of Japan, including Osaka)
関心(かんしん): concern, interest
関する(かんする): concern, be related
関東(かんとう): Kantou (eastern half of Japan, including Tokyo)
関連(かんれん): relation, connection, relevance
機関(きかん): organ, mechanism, facility, engine
機関車(きかんしゃ): locomotive, engine
交通機関(こうつうきかん): transportation facilities
税関(ぜいかん): customs house
関係(かんけい): relationship
玄関(げんかん): entranceway, entry hall
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: This gate of horns will take you to heaven. These horns are related and connected to heaven in some way.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Perhaps they are related to heaven because the devil has horns? Perhaps they are connected to heaven because these are the horns of heaven's enemies? The real reason they're connected will be revealed in the reading mnemonic.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: They are related and connected to heaven because these are the horns that Genghis Khan (かん) made from his enemies. God said he could come into heaven if he made a gate of horns, so that's what he did.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine Genghis Khan taking horns off his enemies, and making a gate to heaven. The horn gate is connected to both heaven and Genghis Khan in that way.

  • [таможенная] пошлина, таможенный сбор

    • warodai

関字的基本解释

関
guān
同“关”。

関字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guān］
［《廣韻》古還切，平删，見。］
“关1”的繁体字。亦作“閞1”。亦作“関1”。亦作“闗1”。亦作“1”。
(1)门闩。
(2)门；门扇。
(3)泛指门户、出入口。
(4)城门；要塞。
(5)特指函谷关或潼关。
(6)征税的关卡。
(7)关税。
(8)控制。
(9)僧尼与外界隔绝、静坐修行时所住的龛或房。
(10)使开着的物体合拢。
(11)处置；安排。
(12)禁闭；放在里面不使出来。
(13)（商店或工厂）歇业。
(14)比喻经受严峻考验的时刻。
(15)指境界。
(16)经过，通过。
(17)禀告。
(18)表白。
(19)犹纳入。
(20)古代官府之间行文询事或提取案犯。
(21)古代亦指平行官府之间往来的公文。
(22)索要；领取；发放。
(23)机器或物体中起转动关联作用的部分。
(24)引申为事物中最关紧要的部分，对情况起决定作用的因素。
(25)关联；涉及。
(26)牵系。
(2

関字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【門字部】　関； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1334第08
【正字通】俗關字。

関字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guān］
["Guangyun" is still cut in ancient times, deleted flat, see. ]
Traditional characters for "关1". Also known as "閞1". Also known as "Off 1". Also known as "闗1". Also known as "1".
(1) Door latch.
(2) Door; door leaf.
(3) Broadly refers to portals, entrances and exits.
(4) City gate; fortress.
(5) Specifically refers to Hangu Pass or Tong Pass.
(6) Checkpoints for taxation.
(7) Tariff.
(8) Control.
(9) The niche or room where monks and nuns live in isolation from the outside world and sit in meditation practice.
(10) Close the open objects.
(11) Disposal; Arrangement.
(12) Confinement; put it inside without letting it out.
(13) (Shop or factory) closed.
(14) A metaphor for a moment of severe test.
(15) Refers to realm.
(16) Go through and pass.
(17) Report.
(18) Confession.
(19) Still included.
(20) Inquiring about matters or extracting criminals between ancient government and government.
(21) In ancient times, it also refers to official documents between parallel government offices.
(22) Ask for; receive; issue.
(23) The part of the machine or object that plays the role of rotation correlation.
(24) It is extended to be the most important part of things, which is the decisive factor of the situation.
(25) Associated; involved.
(26) Linkage.
(2

guān
сокр. вм. 关

関

Значения

Иметь отношение, затрагивать, ставить под угрозу; застава; касаться

Мнемоника

  • Обход постов с факелами, видимых через створки ворот 門. По иной версии — ворота на двойном запоре 关, т.е. барьер, застава.

  • "Я принёс подарок к воротам 門, чтобы иметь хорошие отношения."

Варианты

關, 关

Radicals: 門, 天  (gate, heaven, horns)
Meaning Mnemonic
This gate of horns will take you to heaven. These horns are related and connected to heaven in some way.
Perhaps they are related to heaven because the devil has horns? Perhaps they are connected to heaven because these are the horns of heaven's enemies? The real reason they're connected will be revealed in the reading mnemonic.
Reading Mnemonic
They are related and connected to heaven because these are the horns that Genghis Khan (かん) made from his enemies. God said he could come into heaven if he made a gate of horns, so that's what he did.
Imagine Genghis Khan taking horns off his enemies, and making a gate to heaven. The horn gate is connected to both heaven and Genghis Khan in that way.
